text: beshak musalmaan mardh aur musalmaan aurte, momin mardh aur momin aurte, farma bardaari karne waale mardh aur farma bardaar aurte, raasth baaz mardh aur raasth baaz aurte, sabr karne waale mardh aur sabr karne waali aurte, aajizi karne waale mardh aur aajizi karne waali aurte, khayraath karne waale mardh aur khairaath karne waali aurte, roze rakhne waale mardh aur roze rakhne waali aurte, apni sharam gaah ki hifaazath karne waale mardh aur hifaazath karne waaliya, ba kasrath Allah ka zikr karne waale aur zikr karne waaliya, in (sab ke) liye Allah taâ€™ala ne (wasi) maghfirath aur bada sawaab tayyaar kar rakha hai
